alert.note: Alert for Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 4:30PM CDT until May 07 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Sangamon County in central Illinois... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 430 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Loami, or 8 miles southwest of Springfield, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Chatham around 440 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Springfield. This includes Interstate 55 between mile markers 86 and 91. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
